Title: Authorizes N.Y. city to impose the city earnings tax on nonresidents; repealer
Summary: Authorizes a city having a population of one million or more to impose the city earnings tax on nonresidents; provides a real property tax credit to those nonresidents.
LawCode: Rpld Chap 5 of 1999; add Art 2-E §§25-m - 25-o, Gen City L; amd §1301, Tax L; add §556-a, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law and the tax law, in relation to imposing the earnings tax on nonresidents; to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a real property tax credit; and to repeal chapter 5 of the laws of 1999, amending the tax law and the general city law relating to the definition of nonresident for the purpose of imposing the earnings tax on nonresidents
